verses.verse: And there was <WH1961> a man <WH376> of mount <WH4480> <WH2022> Ephraim, <WH669> whose name <WH8034> was Micah. <WH4321>

And he said <WH559> unto his mother, <WH517> The eleven hundred <WH505> <WH3967> shekels of silver <WH3701> that <WH834> were taken <WH3947> from thee, about which thou <WH859> cursedst, <WH422> and spakest <WH559> of also <WH1571> in mine ears, <WH241> behold, <WH2009> the silver <WH3701> is with <WH854> me; I <WH589> took <WH3947> it. And his mother <WH517> said, <WH559> Blessed <WH1288> be thou of the LORD, <WH3068> my son. <WH1121>

And when he had restored <WH7725> <WH853> the eleven hundred <WH505> <WH3967> shekels of silver <WH3701> to his mother, <WH517> his mother <WH517> said, <WH559> I had wholly dedicated <WH6942> <WH6942> <WH853> the silver <WH3701> unto the LORD <WH3068> from my hand <WH4480> <WH3027> for my son, <WH1121> to make <WH6213> a graven image <WH6459> and a molten image: <WH4541> now <WH6258> therefore I will restore <WH7725> it unto thee.

Yet he restored <WH7725> <WH853> the money <WH3701> unto his mother; <WH517> and his mother <WH517> took <WH3947> two hundred <WH3967> shekels of silver, <WH3701> and gave <WH5414> them to the founder, <WH6884> who made <WH6213> thereof a graven image <WH6459> and a molten image: <WH4541> and they were <WH1961> in the house <WH1004> of Micah. <WH4321>

And the man <WH376> Micah <WH4318> had a house <WH1004> of gods, <WH430> and made <WH6213> an ephod, <WH646> and teraphim, <WH8655> and consecrated <WH4390> <WH853> <WH3027> one <WH259> of his sons, <WH4480> <WH1121> who became <WH1961> his priest. <WH3548>
In those <WH1992> days <WH3117> there was no <WH369> king <WH4428> in Israel, <WH3478> but every man <WH376> did <WH6213> that which was right <WH3477> in his own eyes. <WH5869>

And there was <WH1961> a young man <WH5288> out of Bethlehem-judah <WH4480> <WH1035> <WH3063> of the family <WH4480> <WH4940> of Judah, <WH3063> who <WH1931> was a Levite, <WH3881> and he <WH1931> sojourned <WH1481> there. <WH8033>

And the man <WH376> departed <WH1980> out of the city <WH4480> <WH5892> from Bethlehem-judah <WH4480> <WH1035> <WH3063> to sojourn <WH1481> where <WH834> he could find <WH4672> a place: and he came <WH935> to mount <WH2022> Ephraim <WH669> to <WH5704> the house <WH1004> of Micah, <WH4318> as he journeyed. <WH6213> <WH1870>

And Micah <WH4318> said <WH559> unto him, Whence <WH4480> <WH370> comest <WH935> thou? And he said <WH559> unto <WH413> him, I <WH595> am a Levite <WH3881> of Bethlehem-judah, <WH4480> <WH1035> <WH3063> and I <WH595> go <WH1980> to sojourn <WH1481> where <WH834> I may find <WH4672> a place.

And Micah <WH4318> said <WH559> unto him, Dwell <WH3427> with <WH5978> me, and be <WH1961> unto me a father <WH1> and a priest, <WH3548> and I <WH595> will give <WH5414> thee ten <WH6235> shekels of silver <WH3701> by the year, <WH3117> and a suit <WH6187> of apparel, <WH899> and thy victuals. <WH4241> So the Levite <WH3881> went in. <WH1980>
And the Levite <WH3881> was content <WH2974> to dwell <WH3427> with <WH854> the man; <WH376> and the young man <WH5288> was <WH1961> unto him as one <WH259> of his sons. <WH4480> <WH1121>
And Micah <WH4318> consecrated <WH4390> <WH853> <WH3027> the Levite; <WH3881> and the young man <WH5288> became <WH1961> his priest, <WH3548> and was <WH1961> in the house <WH1004> of Micah. <WH4318>
Then said <WH559> Micah, <WH4318> Now <WH6258> know <WH3045> I that <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> will do me good, <WH3190> seeing <WH3588> I have <WH1961> a Levite <WH3881> to my priest. <WH3548>
